name: wscore-ct-heatmap
label: wscore-ct-heatmap: generate heatmaps of cortical thinning relative to normative data.
description: Calculates cortical thickness w-scores with age and sex as covariates, and compiles these data into an html report.

cortical_thickness_image.description: Patient's cortical thickness image in subject space.

label_image.description: Schaefer atlas 200x17 label image in subject space.

author: Will Tackett, Sarah Burke
